title: Taylor Swift Engagement Ring Predictions: Experts Say Travis Kelce Already Picked a $1.5M Oval Diamond
shortdescription: Jewelers reveal the exact ring Travis reportedly chose for Taylor.
author: Jane Doe

content.content: Sources confirm Travis Kelce has already purchased Taylor Swift’s engagement ring — a stunning 10-carat oval diamond on a platinum pavé band, reportedly worth $1.5 million.

Hidden details include tiny engraved footballs and music notes, plus a sapphire (Taylor’s birthstone) set inside the band. Jewelers say Travis worked with a private designer in Kansas City for six months.
Insiders predict a Christmas Eve or New Year’s Eve proposal during the Chiefs’ holiday break — with an intimate ceremony planned for summer 2026.
